parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Send the command to the list of clients.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sendAUMessage''' [clientList, command]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [clientList, command]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> clientList: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> command: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>sendAUMessage <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>dpnid1, dpnid2], "ConnectTo: 192.168.1.66"]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[sendUDPMessage]]
</value></part></template>
